img_above_text:
![Wukong BlackWind 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/79/Wukong_BlackWind_9.jpg)
If you see him raise one foot up, quickly Immobilize or dash to the side, as he’ll try to stagger you with a quick kick, and then race forward with his spear to keep charging into you for multiple hits that’s nearly impossible to get out of once he starts.
img_below_text:
His most frustrating attack will come when he transforms into the Black Wind itself, becoming a wisp-like thing that floats around the arena. You’ll need to look carefully for the small “bursts” emanating from the wisp that denote its charge attack straight at you, and can happen in two quick dashes back and forth.
![Wukong BlackWind 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7a/Wukong_BlackWind_11.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong BlackWind 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/79/Wukong_BlackWind_9.jpg)
If you see him raise one foot up, quickly Immobilize or dash to the side, as he’ll try to stagger you with a quick kick, and then race forward with his spear to keep charging into you for multiple hits that’s nearly impossible to get out of once he starts."
        - Following Text: "His most frustrating attack will come when he transforms into the Black Wind itself, becoming a wisp-like thing that floats around the arena. You’ll need to look carefully for the small “bursts” emanating from the wisp that denote its charge attack straight at you, and can happen in two quick dashes back and forth.
![Wukong BlackWind 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7a/Wukong_BlackWind_11.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a moment from the boss fight against the "Black Wind King" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is shown mid-combat in a forested arena, with the boss seemingly unleashing an energy-based attack, creating a swirling, chaotic visual effect. The text "I am the Black Wind!" appears on-screen, emphasizing the boss's transformation or power. This scene aligns with the guide's description of the boss's challenging and dynamic attack patterns.
